Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problme on a train at Harlem (O'Hare). Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problme on a train at Harlem (O'Hare).

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
